about_the_game:
Zombie King-Junchen-Xiaozhan is a new version of the "Spiritual Notes" released a new version of the grievance character "small stiff", dlc contains a small rigid permanent unlock.
This dlc will be used as a pre-emptive benefit payment, and will be converted to in-game Ling and Gu coins unlocked after March 31.


Wraith characteristics:
1. Can't see the detectives walking under the armpits and underarms (the breathe of the breath can't be detected);
2. It will slow down when it is illuminated by a flashlight (zombie fear);
3. Each attack will reduce the speed of the detective movement (continuing the weakening of the detective);
4. The basic movement speed is slightly faster than normal;
5. The attack will randomly infect a corpse poison in a detective, suggesting that the poisoning detective will become a zombie after 1 minute (the ability of a zombie to attack only to poison people);
6. Attacks will be shaken regardless of whether there is a hit or not. It is a new type of attack mode;
7. The single attack power is low. After the attack, the human can't automatically recover the soul value, and it will continue to lose the soul value. It needs to be treated to stop losing the soul value.
8. Press the space to jump on the obstacle.

Skill introduction:
1 skill: yin perception
After opening the skill, see a recent range of the nearest detective position within a certain range.
2 Skills: Summons a zombie to wander, facing someone in the direction that will grab control and expose

3 Skills: One-time burst acceleration for 5 seconds and can not be controlled, the first touched unit grabs continuous blood-sucking until the player falls to the ground (can be interrupted)
